blocks.name: bj-sbf3
blocks.content: Substitution has no effect on a bound variable (existential quantifier case); see ~ sbf2 . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-sbf4
blocks.content: Substitution has no effect on a bound variable (nonfreeness case); see ~ sbf2 . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-sbnf
blocks.content: Move nonfree predicate in and out of substitution; see ~ sbal and ~ sbex . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-sbnf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wnf(s2, w0)), wnf(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wsb(s0, s1, wnf(s2, w0)), wnf(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))), wal(s2, wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))))
  albii(s2, wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0))), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))))
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0))), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0))))
  sbim(s0, s1, w0, wal(s2, w0))
  imbi2i(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
  sbal(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wnf(s2, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))), wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))))
  sbbii(s0, s1, wnf(s2, w0), wal(s2, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0))))
  nf5(s2, w0)
  sbal(s0, s1, s2, wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))
  nf5(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0))
}
